name: MTLFunctionStitchingGraph
desc: A description of a new stitched function.

items.name: init(functionName: String, nodes: [MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode], outputNode: MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode?, attributes: [MTLFunctionStitchingAttribute])
items.desc: Creates a description of a new function call graph.

items.name: var functionName: String
items.desc: The name of the new stitched function.

items.name: var nodes: [MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode]
items.desc: The nodes in the function’s call graph.

items.name: var outputNode: MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode?
items.desc: The node with the output that’s the output of the new stitched function.

items.name: var attributes: [MTLFunctionStitchingAttribute]
items.desc: A list of attributes to configure how the Metal device object generates the new stitched function.
